Breadth-First.Explanation: Introduction and broad orientation without specific clues or hypotheses.
General descriptive clue collection listing man-made objects and signage.
Further broad descriptive clue collection of natural and environmental elements.

Depth-First.Explanation: Convergent analysis focusing on key clue to derive and verify a specific location hypothesis.
Detailed verification and narrowing down to the precise area along tram routes in central Oslo.
Depth-First.KeyElement: Tram route to Majorstuen and central Oslo urban landscape

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to convergent analysis and hypothesis verification based on key clue.
